name: ckanext-dcat_usmetadata
description: This extension provides a react Admin UI for managing custom fields related to [DCAT-US Schema](https://https://resources.data.gov/resources/dcat-us/).

scripts.build: cd metadata-app && yarn && yarn build && cd .. && rm -r ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public/**/* && cp -r metadata-app/build/static/* ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public/ && cd ckanext/dcat_usmetadata/public/ && mv css/main.*.chunk.css css/main.chunk.css && mv js/2.*.chunk.js js/2.chunk.js && mv js/main.*.chunk.js js/main.chunk.js && mv js/runtime-main.*.js js/runtime-main.js
